sentences.en: Assesses the effectiveness of departmental trainers and recommends changes as required.
sentences.cn: 评估部门培训者的效率,根据要求提出调整的建议.

sentences.en: B : focus on teamwork, interpersonal, inter - departmental communication and coordination with each other.
sentences.cn: 注重团队合作精神, 人与人之间, 部门与部门之间相互沟通与协调.

sentences.en: Cooperate with Procurement Manger to manage the departmental daily routine.
sentences.cn: 协助项目采购经理管理部门的日常事务.

sentences.en: Coordinate departmental training with Department Heads, check and help department training.
sentences.cn: 与部门经理协调部门的培训工作, 检查、指导和帮助部门搞好培训.

sentences.en: Departmental reading rooms are even less accessible than libraries.
sentences.cn: 系阅览室比图书馆更难进入.

sentences.en: Establish departmental reporting relationships and operating processes and procedures.
sentences.cn: 建立所属职能部门的汇报关系和运作程序.

sentences.en: I know you find the departmental turf wars as tedious as I do.
sentences.cn: 我想你和我一样知道各部门间的分割有多无聊.

sentences.en: I want this memo to go to all departmental managers.
sentences.cn: 这份备忘录要送交各部门的经理.

sentences.en: Improved departmental operations and flow and production statistics network.
sentences.cn: 完善了部门运作流程及生产统计网络.

sentences.en: It'should audit all department expenditures regarding teaching, research, and all departmental promotions.
sentences.cn: (一)本系教学及研究财物运用之稽核.

sentences.en: More than 80 consultative committees operate at the departmental level.
sentences.cn: 在部门层面则设有八十多个部门协商委员会.

sentences.en: The high school adjusted its teaching approach and cancelled its departmental system.
sentences.cn: 他们高中调整了教学方法,取消了“文理分科”.

sentences.en: The Secretary of Education is right to seek a bigger departmental budget.
sentences.cn: 教育部长寻求更多的部门预算是对的。

sentences.en: We have set up an inter - departmental Greening Master Plan Committee.
sentences.cn: 我们成立了 跨 部门绿化总纲委员会.

sentences.en: We may have to agree that the noble Lord is not precisely a nonpareil as a departmental minister.
sentences.cn: 我们也许只能一致认定：这位高贵的勋爵作为一位大臣不一定算得全善全美。

sentences.en: Your sending me the departmental form for admission will be much appreciated.
sentences.cn: 请贵系将申请表寄来.不胜感谢.

trans.tran_cn: 部门的，各部的，各县的，分科的
trans.tran_en: Departmental is used to describe the activities, responsibilities, or possessions of a department in a government, company, or other organization
